channel.title: Hp help..:S
channel.description:
Hi i wanted to change the starting hp...
but it messed up somehow..
It was 48/56 when i downlaoded it..
I wanted it 10..
This is what i did in player.java
[code] for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; >>>> hp lvl playerXP[i] = 1157; >>>> hp xp } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; >>>> other stats lvl playerXP[i] = 0; >>>> other stats xp } } [/code]
some1 tell me how to fix.. rofl

item.title: Hp help..:S
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Hi i wanted to change the starting hp…

but it messed up somehow…

It was 48/56 when i downlaoded it…

I wanted it 10…

This is what i did in player.java

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
			if (i == 3) {
				playerLevel[i] = 10;       >>>> hp lvl
				playerXP[i] = 1157;          >>>> hp xp
			} else {
				playerLevel[i] = 1;        >>>> other stats lvl
				playerXP[i] = 0;         >>>> other stats xp
			}
		}

some1 tell me how to fix… rofl

Read full topic
